channel.title: How to add tradeable npcs. and add items to them?
channel.description:
hi,
I've set a npc named Hans at home, and now I want to make him tradeable so I can add some cool rare stuff. I've search on google to it, and google says i've to add him at shops.cfg and put the item numbers in there.
so that's what I did. but if I want to run my server again it gives an error.
please help me :(

item.title: How to add tradeable npcs. and add items to them?
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

Alright, its trial and error with port forwarding, try using utorrent.

But head some advice, pretend your firewall is a net that keeps hackers, bugs and all the nastey things out of your computer, when you open a port it is just like punching a big whole in that net. i would not port forward on a computer you use for banking, you use for any personal information at all, in fact id only port forward on a pc that has nothing at all because you are risking keyloggers, risking you having to do a computer factory reset.

and all this happens because mostly little 12 year olds think its funny. but all in all its your computer.

buying any vps most of them will walk you through with what you have to do. VPSland is different its cheap, but they wont hellp with shit I use VPSland but because I already know what im doing.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add tradeable npcs. and add items to them?

item.title: How to add tradeable npcs. and add items to them?
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

Well i’ve tried to get it on.

i’ve watched the name of router what’s netgear.
But i’ve to get 192.xxx.xxx or something but I’ve 10.0.0.1 and all that stuff I don’t understand.
i’m using server IP: localhost ;p
and port : 43595

that’s the only way for me to get on I guess.

I know about Vps but I don’t want to buy it too fast.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add tradeable npcs. and add items to them?

item.title: How to add tradeable npcs. and add items to them?
item.dc:creator: @emtrescue emtrescue
item.description:
@emtrescue wrote:

from the look of it. it sounds like you just downloaded your rsps.

that you havnt tried to do anything and decided to post in server help before making an attempt, first about shops, which im glad you figured out eventually.

now for getting the server online, just because i know the rest of the community will say this. there is over 20 tuts on how to mae a server online

the first step is to port forward search that on mopar if you fail to do this ther eis an automatic port forwarder here.

the next step is changing your cllient ip and getting a no-ip adres from no-ip.com

agian search these forums of how to do this. and the last step is to uplodoad your client and have people download that and play.

about port forwarding i strongly suggest not to do it on your own computer, esp if you are a server that is new cause I know for a fact new severs try to get people … anyway they can. People will try to hack,spam and ::yell your server out of besinus I strongly suggest to get a vps. They are cheap and most already come port forwarded.

Read full topic
